alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Clarendon; Lee; Sumter (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 05 at 7:25PM EDT until April 05 at 8:15PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: The National Weather Service in Columbia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Lee County in central South Carolina... Eastern Calhoun County in central South Carolina... Central Clarendon County in central South Carolina... Central Sumter County in central South Carolina... * Until 815 PM EDT. * At 725 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Lydia to 6 miles southeast of Poinsett State Park, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. * Locations impacted include... Sumter, Manning, Bishopville, South Sumter, Alcolu, Woods Bay State Park, Elliott, Mulberry, Lee State Park, Sumter County Airport, Millwood, Turbeville, Mayesville, Pinewood, Lynchburg, Paxville, Rimini, Brogdon, Oswego and Lakewood. This includes the following highways... Interstate 20 in South Carolina between mile markers 118 and 126. Interstate 95 between mile markers 113 and 146. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for central South Carolina. For your protection seek shelter inside a sturdy building and stay away from windows. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for central South Carolina.
